info.title: iKnow REST APIs
info.description:
This is the [OpenAPI Specification](https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification) 
of the iKnow REST APIs, giving you RESTful access to iKnow domain contents in your system
Use [swagger-ui](https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-ui/blob/master/README.md)
or a similar tool to conveniently browse and test these APIs.
For more information on iKnow, visit [intersystems.com](http://www.intersystems.com)

license.name: Copyright InterSystems Corporation, all rights reserved.

domainParam.name: domain
domainParam.description: the ID of the domain to query

sourceParam.name: source
sourceParam.description: the source ID to query for

PageNumber.description: which "page" of the results to retrieve

PageSize.description: how many results to retrieve per "page"

FilterMode.description: filter mode to use for optionally recalculating certain metrics. Defaults to recalculating all and re-sorting the results (15).

IncludeCount.description: whether or not to include a count of all results (ignoring page and pageSize)

CountOnly.description: whether or not to retrieve just the count and no result list

Skiplists.description: array of skiplist IDs or names to use for limiting query results, OR a valid SELECT clause retrieving entity values outright

Filter.description: filter object restricting the sources to be considered in this query

operator.description: for use with group filters ("AND"|"OR") or metadata-based filters (any other value)

className.description: use for filters not covered by other shorthands

arguments.description: for use with 'className' property, any arguments to be passed to the filter's %New() method (except domain ID)

HighlightingRule.description: "style" property is mandatory, then pick one selector per rule

style.description:
style specification for this highlighting rule: either a two-character 
sequence or a HTML tag to use for wrapping the to-be-highlighted element.
Use one selector per highlighting rule.

role.description: selector - selects all entities with this role

attribute.description: selector - selects all entities affected by this attribute

attributeWords.description: selector - selects all marker terms indicating this attribute

dictionaries.description: selector - selects any dictionary match of the specified dictionary IDs

dictionaryItems.description: selector - selects any dictionary match of the specified dictionary item IDs

matchType.description: refines the "anyMatch", "dictionaries" or "dictionaryItems" selectors to the designated match type

count.description: number of result sources (ignoring page and pageSize)
number of result entities (ignoring page and pageSize)

frequency.description: number of times the entity occurs in the result set

spread.description: number of distinct sources the entity occurs in in the result set

head.description: entity value of the head concept

tail.description: entity value of the tail concept

frequency.description: number of times the CRC occurs in the result set

spread.description: number of distinct sources the CRC occurs in in the result set

count.description: number of result CRCs (ignoring page and pageSize)

head.description: entity value of the head concept

tail.description: entity value of the tail concept

count.description: total number of dictionaries (ignoring page and pageSize)

uri.description: unique, domain-wide identifier for this Dictionary Item

string.description: if this is a regular term, the term string value

regexp.description: if this is a regular expression format term, the regular expression

replace.description: if this is a regular expression format term, the replacement string

formatClass.description: if this is a format term, the name of the format implementation class

formatParams.description: if this is a format term, any additional parameters for the format implementation class

partialCount.description: number of partially matched entities for this match

ordered.description: whether or not the matched entities appear in the term's order

target.title: MatchTarget
target.description: the matched piece of the source text

sentence.description: full text of the sentence where the match occurred

elements.description: detailed overview of entity-level match results

partId.description: entity occurrence / part ID of the matched sentence part

literal.description: literal string how this part appeared in the sentence

matchedWords.description: which words within the entity actually matched

negated.description: whether this sentence part is part of a negative context

entityId.description: entity ID, if this part corresponds to an entity

entity.description: entity value, if this part corresponds to an entity

output.description: format output, if this part corresponds to a matched format providing output

literal.description: literal value of this part in the sentence

role.description: role of this entity in the path

entityId.description: unique entity ID, if this is not a non-relevant

entity.description: entity value, if this is not a non-relevant

stemId.description: stem ID for this entity, if the domain is configured for stemming

stem.description: stem value of this entity, if the domain is configured for stemming

level.description: level at which the attribute applies

words.description: if level="word", the actual words affected

tag.description: the tags used to enclose the highlighted segments

limit.description: limit the segments get highlighted,check %iFind.Utils.Highlight() for details

name.description: the alias name for the column containing highlighted text
the alias name for the column containing rank info

OptionSpec.description: The option could be object which includes all the required parameters. However, you could still use "0","1","2","3","4" these simple strings for option for the legacy support

mode.description: the iFind search options. 0/normal search,1/stemmed search,2/decompunded search,3/fuzzy search,4/regex search, "*" indicates use the index setting

arguments.description: the arguments needed for initialize a stemming/decompounding class

get.summary: Retrieves the top entities for this domain

frequency.description: number of times the entity occurs in the result set

spread.description: number of distinct sources the entity occurs in in the result set

dominance.description: relevance of the entity in this result set

tfidf.description: TFIDF-based metric expressing relevance of the entity in this result set

bm25.description: BM25-based metric expressing relevance of the entity in this result set

post.summary: Retrieves the top entities for this domain

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

sortBy.description: criterion to use for retrieving the top entities

useStems.description: retrieve stems rather than entities. (only available when the domain has stemming enabled and for certain sortBy values)

role.description: whether to retrieve top concepts, relationships or both (only available for certain sortBy values)

includeMetrics.description: additional metrics to retrieve, on top of what is automatically retrieved based on the sortBy value

frequency.description: number of times the entity occurs in the result set

spread.description: number of distinct sources the entity occurs in in the result set

dominance.description: relevance of the entity in this result set

tfidf.description: TFIDF-based metric expressing relevance of the entity in this result set

bm25.description: BM25-based metric expressing relevance of the entity in this result set

count.description: total number of entities in this domain (if RequestBody.includeCount is true, ignoring page and pageSize)

get.summary: Retrieves entities similar to a seed string

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: the seed string to find similar entities for

post.summary: Retrieves entities similar to a seed string

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: the seed string to find similar entities for

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

string.description: if set, overrides value of path parameter

type.description: method to calculate / retrieve similar entities. ("ngrams" requires the domain to be configured for it)

useStems.description: retrieve stems rather than entities. (only available when the domain has stemming enabled and for certain sortBy values)

role.description: whether to retrieve top concepts, relationships or both (only available for certain sortBy values)

post.summary: Retrieves entities similar to a seed string

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

string.description: the seed string to find similar entities for

type.description: method to calculate / retrieve similar entities. ("ngrams" requires the domain to be configured for it)

useStems.description: retrieve stems rather than entities. (only available when the domain has stemming enabled and for certain sortBy values)

role.description: whether to retrieve top concepts, relationships or both (only available for certain sortBy values)

get.summary: Retrieves entities related to a seed entity based on proximity or direct relationships

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: the seed entity to find related entities for

post.summary: Retrieves entities related to a seed entity based on proximity or direct relationships

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: the seed entity to find related entities for

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

entity.description: if set, overrides value of path parameter

sortBy.description: criterion to use for retrieving the related entities

post.summary: Retrieves entities related to a seed entity based on proximity or direct relationships

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

entity.description: the seed entity to find related ones for

sortBy.description: criterion to use for retrieving the related entities

get.summary: Retrieves all sources matching the supplied filter

post.summary: Retrieves all sources matching the supplied filter

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

includeMetadata.description: whether or not to include metadata for each retrieved source

includeSnippets.description: if set to a nonzero value, a snippet of the designated length (in sentences) will be retrieved for each source

get.summary: Retrieves all sources containing the supplied entity

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: entity to look for.

post.summary: Retrieves all sources containing the supplied entity

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: entity to look for. If supplied in the request object, that value will take precedence over the path parameter

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

entity.description: if supplied, overwrites the value of the "entity" path parameter

includeMetadata.description: whether or not to include metadata for each retrieved source

includeSnippets.description: if set to true, a snippet made up of all sentences containing the designated entities will be retrieved for each source

actualFormOnly.description: when this domain supports stemming, set to true to restrict to the supplied actual form only

setOperation.description: when supplying multiple entities, controls how the results for each entity should be combined

post.summary: Retrieves all sources containing the supplied entity

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

entity.description: the entity or list of entities to query for

includeMetadata.description: whether or not to include metadata for each retrieved source

includeSnippets.description: if set to true, a snippet made up of all sentences containing the designated entities will be retrieved for each source

actualFormOnly.description: when this domain supports stemming, set to true to restrict to the supplied actual form only

setOperation.description: when supplying multiple entities, controls how the results for each entity should be combined

get.summary: Retrieves all sources containing the supplied CRC

parameters.name: crc
parameters.description: CRC to look for, as a colon-separated sequence of head, relation and tail.

post.summary: Retrieves all sources containing the supplied CRC

parameters.name: crc
parameters.description: CRC to look for, as a colon-separated sequence of head, relation and tail. If supplied in the request object, that value will take precedence over the path parameter

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

crc.description: if supplied, overwrites the value of the "crc" path parameter

includeMetadata.description: whether or not to include metadata for each retrieved source

includeSnippets.description: if set to true, a snippet made up of all the sentences containing the designated CRCs will be retrieved for each source

setOperation.description: when supplying multiple entities, controls how the results for each entity should be combined

post.summary: Retrieves all sources containing the supplied CRC

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

includeMetadata.description: whether or not to include metadata for each retrieved source

includeSnippets.description: if set to true, a snippet made up of all the sentences containing the designated CRCs will be retrieved for each source

setOperation.description: when supplying multiple entities, controls how the results for each entity should be combined

get.summary: Retrieves all sources similar to a seed source

score.description: score expressing the similarity between this record and the seed document

post.summary: Retrieves all sources similar to a seed source

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

algorithm.description: algorithm to use for calculating similar entities

parameters.description: additional parameters to tune the algorithm

includeMetadata.description: whether or not to include metadata for each retrieved source

includeSnippets.description: if set to a nonzero value, a snippet of the designated length (in sentences) will be retrieved for each source

score.description: score expressing the similarity between this record and the seed document

get.summary: Retrieves the details of a particular source

text.description: textual contents (optionally summarized) of this source

virtual.description: whether or not this is a virtual source

post.summary: Retrieves the details of a particular source

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

includeMetadata.description: whether or not to include metadata for the designated source

includeText.description: whether or not to include the full source text in the result

summarize.description: if set, the text returned will be a summary of the full contents, measuring this many sentences

virtual.description: if set to true, the source ID will be considered to refer to a virtual source

text.description: textual contents (optionally summarized) of this source

virtual.description: whether or not this is a virtual source

post.summary: Adds a source to the domain

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

reference.description: a string to be used for building the new record's external ID

configuration.description: name of a valid configuration object to use or the two-letter ISO code for the language to use (if no such configuration exists)

virtual.description: if true, the source will be added as a virtual one

metadata.description: map of metadata field values to set for the document

id.description: source ID of the newly created record

get.summary: Deletes a source from the domain

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: the source ID to drop

post.summary: Deletes a source from the domain

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: the source ID to drop

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

virtual.description: if set, the supplied source ID will be used to look up a virtual source

delete.summary: Deletes a source from the domain

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: the source ID to drop

post.summary: Registers metadata values for a given source

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: the source ID whose metadata needs updating

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

metadata.description: map of metadata field values to set for this source

get.summary: Retrieves the sentences containing a given entity

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: the entity to query for

post.summary: Retrieves the sentences containing a given entity

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: the entity to query for

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

entity.description: if set, takes precedence over the corresponding path parameter

includeDetails.description: whether or not to include details on the entities for each sentence

actualFormOnly.description: when this domain supports stemming, set to true to restrict to the supplied actual form only

setOperation.description: when supplying multiple entities, controls how the results for each entity should be combined

count.description: total number of paths, ignoring page and pageSize (if RequestBody.includeCount is set)

post.summary: Retrieves the sentences containing a given entity

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

entity.description: if set, takes precedence over the corresponding path parameter

includeDetails.description: whether or not to include details on the entities for each sentence

actualFormOnly.description: when this domain supports stemming, set to true to restrict to the supplied actual form only

setOperation.description: when supplying multiple entities, controls how the results for each entity should be combined

count.description: total number of paths, ignoring page and pageSize (if RequestBody.includeCount is set)

get.summary: Retrieves the details for a particular sentence

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the sentence ID to query for

post.summary: Retrieves the details for a particular sentence

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the sentence ID to query for

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

virtualSourceId.description: if set, the sentence will be looked up in the context of this virtual source

parameters.name: RequestBody

includeCrossDomain.description: whether or not to include cross-domain skiplists

get.summary: Retrieves a list of available dictionaries

post.summary: Retrieves a list of available dictionaries

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

includeItems.description: whether or not to include item and term details as well

get.summary: Create a new dictionary

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: name for the new dictionary

post.summary: Create a new dictionary

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: name for the new dictionary

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

name.description: if provided, overrides the path parameter

items.description: list of items to add (don't supply id values)

match.description: if set to true, the dictionary is immediately matched against the domain's sources

filter.description: if match=1, restricts the sources to be matched

post.summary: Create a new dictionary

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

items.description: list of items to add (don't supply id values)

match.description: if set to true, the dictionary is immediately matched against the domain's sources

filter.description: if match=1, restricts the sources to be matched

get.summary: Retrieves the detailed contents for a given Dictionary

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the dictionary to retrieve

post.summary: Retrieves the detailed contents for a given Dictionary

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the dictionary to retrieve

get.summary: Drops a dictionary

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the dictionary to drop

post.summary: Drops a dictionary

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the dictionary to drop

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the dictionary to drop

post.summary: Create new dictionary items

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the dictionary to which to add the new item

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

dictionaryId.description: if provided, overrides the path parameter

items.description: list of items to add (don't supply id values)

match.description: if set to true, the dictionary is immediately matched against the domain's sources

filter.description: if match=1, restricts the sources to be matched

dictionary.title: DictionaryDetails
dictionary.description: the dictionary these items were added to

error.description: the error message, if this item failed to get created

post.summary: Create new dictionary items

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

dictionaryId.description: if provided, overrides the path parameter

items.description: list of items to add (don't supply id values)

match.description: if set to true, the dictionary is immediately matched against the domain's sources

filter.description: if match=1, restricts the sources to be matched

dictionary.title: DictionaryDetails
dictionary.description: the dictionary these items were added to

error.description: the error message, if this item failed to get created

get.summary: Retrieves the detailed contents for a given Dictionary Item

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID or URI of the dictionary item to retrieve

post.summary: Retrieves the detailed contents for a given Dictionary Item

parameters.name: id

post.summary: Create new dictionary terms

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID or URI of the dictionary item to which to add the new terms

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

dictionaryItemId.description: if provided, overrides the corresponding path parameter

terms.description: list of terms to add (don't supply id values). An array of strings will be interpreted as simple terms.

match.description: if set to true, the dictionary is immediately matched against the domain's sources

filter.description: if match=1, restricts the sources to be matched

item.title: DictionaryItemDetails
item.description: the dictionary item these terms were added to

dictionary.title: DictionaryDetails
dictionary.description: the dictionary these terms were added to

error.description: the error message, if this term failed to get created

post.summary: Create new dictionary terms

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

dictionaryItemId.description: if provided, overrides the corresponding path parameter

terms.description: list of terms to add (don't supply id values). An array of strings will be interpreted as simple terms.

match.description: if set to true, the dictionary is immediately matched against the domain's sources

filter.description: if match=1, restricts the sources to be matched

item.title: DictionaryItemDetails
item.description: the dictionary item these terms were added to

dictionary.title: DictionaryDetails
dictionary.description: the dictionary these terms were added to

get.summary: Retrieves all dictionary matches for a given source

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the source ID to query for

post.summary: Retrieves all dictionary matches for a given source

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the source ID to query for

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

matchFirst.description: ensures this source is matched against the latest dictionaries before retrieving results

dictionaries.description: if set, limits results to these dictionary IDs

includeDictionaryDetails.description: whether or not to retrieve dictionary details as well

includeMatchDetails.description: whether or not to retrieve entity-level match details as well

includeSnippets.description: whether or not to include the text of the matched sentence

get.summary: Retrieves all dictionary matches for a dictionary item

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

filter.description: optionally filters the results to those matches in sources selected by this filter

matchFirst.description: ensures the domain is matched against the latest dictionaries before retrieving results

includeDictionaryDetails.description: whether or not to dictionary details as well

includeMatchDetails.description: whether or not to entity-level match details as well

includeSnippets.description: whether or not to include the text of the matched sentence

post.summary: Indexes the supplied text and returns concepts, relations and CRCs

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

text.example: This text is in urgent need of fancy markup!

configuration.description: name of a valid configuration object to use or the two-letter ISO code for the language to use (if no such configuration exists)

summarize.description: if set to a nonzero value, the text returned will be a summary of the full contents, measuring this many sentences

includeMatches.description: whether or not to retrieve dictionary matches for the indexed record

dictionaries.description: if set, limits results to these dictionary IDs

includeDictionaryDetails.description: whether or not to retrieve dictionary details as well

includeMatchDetails.description: whether or not to entity-level match details as well

concepts.description: list of concepts for this text

relations.description: list of relations for this text

matches.description: list of dictionary matches for this text

get.description: Simple endpoint to print this Swagger definition in YAML

post.summary: Search the given iFind index in the given table

parameters.name: RequestBody
parameters.description: JSON object with a list of query-specific arguments

query.description: This is the only necessary parameter with no default value. The search terms to query against the iFind index.

index.description: the iFind index would be searched against, if you don't specify it, the first found iFind index would be used .

distance.description: only valid when option is fuzzy search (when option is 3)

language.description: iKnow-supported language model to apply, for example "en"

includeText.description: whether the returned columns should include the column beging indexed by 'index'

columns.description: specify the columns which also needed to be returned. For example, ["column1","column2"]

where.description: the valid SQL logical condition statement. For example, "column1 = ? AND column2 = ?"
